title: Chat locks
body: So recently i've had this thing where if i put in a few smaller messages one after another, i get this random blocked chat, i want to know what this is, i have no chat restriction and it seems an odd thing to happen, and it seems to not happen to others given the frequency of their messaging.

replies.body:
Yeah I get the same thing. It happens to me when I go to call a lane in chat, i'll spam my call as you usually do, get 2 messages in and get blocked while people say "I called mid hurr" and I'm chat blocked temporarily so I have no chance to say that I called.

It's making me frustrated as it loses me 10 seconds of time I could use to call another lane before being lumped into support.
you get it in chat rooms and such. it's so you can't spam messages and annoy people.

The problem being 2 fold in this scenario though.

1) it doesn't seem to be something everyone has.
2) it does it way too often for things that are actually being typed out properly, meaning for someone that puts out short stream of conscious sort of thoughts it can be a problem

Like legitimately i've ran into this about 4 times already, and i'm not someone who spams anything.

how long does it last? is it like 10 seconds? cause I've had my chat restricted for like 10 seconds by typing like 2 word sentences at least 15 times.
and you shouldn't be typing in short streams, it's fucking annoying for everyone else because it covers up the whole chat
it's 10 seconds or so, and i'm not spamming them in that sense, it's usually for 4-5 words for 2 lines.
I get one the instant I join the room after a game, it's locked for 5 seconds so I cannot say GG.
